nodes.text: "The Incident, Part 1" is a comic story that was published as the lead story of Star Wars Adventures 5 on June 23, 2021. It was written by Katie Cook and illustrated by Cara McGee.
Anakin Skywalker is depicted with two flesh hands; however, his right arm was replaced with a mechno-arm at the beginning of the Clone Wars, and he did not cover it with synthskin.
